utils-merge
Version Build Quality Coverage Dependencies

Merges the properties from a source object into a destination object.

Install
$ npm install utils-merge
Usage
var a = { foo: 'bar' }
  , b = { bar: 'baz' };

merge(a, b);
// => { foo: 'bar', bar: 'baz' }
